query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.sendtime>=to_timestamp('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_timestamp('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.operatedeptid in (@revDeptId@) and est.operatedeptid is not null

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.sendtime,est.senddeptid from est_netdata est where est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.sendtime>to_timestamp('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_timestamp('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.operatedeptid='@s1@'

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.operatetype=114 and est.linkFailedReason='101091001' and est.linkCutResult='101090303' and est.sendtime>to_timestamp('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_timestamp('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.operatedeptid in (@revDeptId@) and est.operatedeptid is not null

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.sendtime,est.senddeptid from est_netdata est where est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.operatetype=114 and est.linkFailedReason='101091001' and est.sendtime>to_timestamp('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_timestamp('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.operatedeptid='@s1@' and est.linkCutResult='101090303'

query-define.name: query3
query-define.where: est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.operatetype=114 and est.sendtime>to_timestamp('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_timestamp('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.operatedeptid in (@revDeptId@) and est.operatedeptid is not null and est.linkIsPlan='1030102'

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.sendtime,est.senddeptid from est_netdata est where est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.operatetype=114 and est.sendtime>to_timestamp('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_timestamp('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.operatedeptid='@s1@' and est.linkIsPlan='1030102'
